q: In spite of everything I still believe that people are really good at heart. I see the world gradually being turned into a wilderness, I hear the ever approaching thunder, which will destroy us too, I can feel the sufferings of millions and yet, if I look up into the heavens, I think that it will all come right, that this cruelty too will end, and that peace and tranquility will return again.
When many little people in many little places do many little things, then the whole world changes.
With thoughtful contemplation and reverence for humanity, we can adjust our behavior to allow for all people to live life
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
If you genuinely want something, don't wait for it â€” teach yourself to be impatient.
